headline: Chocolate Makers Hopeful That 2026 Brings Cheaper Cocoa

headline: Cocoa Prices Fall on Signs of Weak Chocolate Demand
summary: December ICE NY cocoa (CCZ25 ) today is down -45 (-0.74%), and December ICE London cocoa #7 (CAZ25 ) is down -3 (-0.07%). Cocoa prices are sliding today but remain above Wednesday's 1-week lows. Comments today from the CEO of chocolate-maker Hershey are weighing on cocoa prices when he said...

headline: Mondelez (MDLZ) Margin Miss Reinforces Dividend and Financial Risks Narrative
summary: Mondelez International (MDLZ) reported a net profit margin of 9.4%, down from 10.6% last year, reflecting negative earnings growth over the past twelve months despite averaging 1% annual earnings growth over the past five years. With shares trading at $57.85, well below the estimated fair value of $114.98, analysts are watching closely as revenue is forecast to grow at 4% per year, slower than the US market’s 10.3%, and earnings are expected to climb at 10.62% annually, lagging the broader...
